summary: This mod adds six pairs of sunglasses (similar to Rayban Wayfarer) to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33787-1-1365112423.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33787-1-1364667573.png[/img][/center]

Please, [size=5][color=#11465d]endorse[/color][/size] if you like it, I'd also be grateful if you could upload screenshots of your chars wearing them :D

You may freely modify my files for your personal use, but you [color=red]must[/color] obtain my permission before releasing your work to the public.

[size=5][color=#11465d]CAUTION:[/color][/size]
This mod is not lore-friendly!

[size=5][color=#11465d]DESCRIPTION:[/color][/size]
This mod adds two pairs of sunglasses (similar to Rayban Wayfarer) to Skyrim. Lens are environmentally mapped to simulate reflections. Contains male and female versions.

[size=5][color=#11465d]UPDATING:[/color][/size]
v1.3: Added a wooden version and a clear lenses version of all sunglasses.
v1.2: Shades forgeable at any forge. Fix compatibility with Breton Race. New Brand "Fus-Ro-DahÂ®".
v1.1: Added a Blue version with Fade lens.

[size=5][color=#11465d]INSTALLATION:[/color][/size]
Download, unpack, place "Data" folder inside your Skyrim main folder, check "Sunglasses_WF.esp" in launcher.

[size=5][color=#11465d]USAGE:[/color][/size]
Open the console and type "help glasses" without quote. See your glasses's ID (a number like this 00000d63) and type "player.additem YOUR_ID 1" again without quote... Or just forge them! (all you need is an iron ingot). Enjoy :)

[size=5][color=#11465d]MODS USED FOR SCREENSHOTS:[/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33158]"Mature skin texture and body" by Maevan2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Ful[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0[/url]

[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/33787-1-1365112423.png[/img][/center]
author: Bedendo
